price: 94. Waxna uma diidin dadka rumeynta markuu hanuunku u yimid oo aan ahayn inay yidhaahdeen: Ma wuxuu Alle soo diray aadmi Rasuul ah?
arabic: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوٓاْ أَبَعَثَ ٱللَّهُ بَشَرٗا رَّسُولٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā manaʿa al-nāsa an yu'minū idh jāahumu al-hudā illā an qālū abaʿatha al-lahu basharan rasūlan
